articles.title: Sony is making a Horizon MMO — here’s the video and details
articles.description: The rumored MMO set in Sony’s post-apocalyptic Horizon universe is real. We spilled details about the game before it was revealed based on an announcement video we saw, and that video has been officially posted — and more has been shared about the title, too. The new game is called Horizon Steel Frontiers, and Sony […]
